dt: {bc}to {d_link|tax|tax:2} (someone or something) too heavily or beyond what is due

dt.t: revenues raised through {wi}overtaxing{/wi} the middle class

dt: {bc}to lay too heavy a burden or demand upon (someone or something)

dt.t: A fancy terminal with enough gates for all the planes, a work force that is alternately {wi}overtaxed{/wi} and underemployed, and a high-tech baggage system all create high fixed costs.

utxt.t: Homelessness is worse here than anywhere in the country. The cost of living is out of control. {wi}Overtaxation{/wi} is rampant. Infrastructure is crumbling.

shortdef: to tax (someone or something) too heavily or beyond what is due
to lay too heavy a burden or demand upon (someone or something)
